reviews.review: first heard about this game when i was like 10 i ab obsessed with it still and want more of it god i wish there was a portal 3 or hl3 to continue the story masterpiece of a game
Very good game, if you liked portal, then you'll like this.

A game you can play at your own pace, with decent graphics on old hardware. AI humor is all over the place, so even if you're alone, well... You're not alone. Some rooms can hold you for half an hour, and community content keeps being produced to this day.

yes very cool game 

play with good pc or you will suffer
still didn't get stepped on, but at least I got to see the moon
This was an amazing puzzle solving game with a great story behind it.

pense que era un juego de escape room/puzzle para pasar el rato, pero tiene de las mejores historias que e jugado. 10/10
The modding community makes this gem even shinier. Hours and hours of challenges for single and coop if you dare to dive in. Overall 8/8, one of my favourite games.

if you like to puzzle this is a fun adventure game!
